name: Barbed-Spikes
title: Barbed-Spikes
author: MrAlwaysAwesome
description:
Adds barbed-spikes, which can be placed down and hurts and slows down any enemy that walks on it. 
 They can be upgraded to: 
 Reinforced (more health and damage) 
 Slowing (slows down more)  
 Poison (deals extra damage) 
 or any combination of the three.  
 Original mod developers: MatheFactor and Kabaril. 
 Updated and maintained by MrAlwaysAwesome.
